website_summaries.verdict: This award-winning double dresser achieves a superb balance of simplicity and functionality with a sleek design and extra deep drawers.
pros: Sturdy non-toxic construction meets ASTM and CPSC standards
Sealed with the Women's Choice Awards stamp of approval
Roomy drawers feature safety stoppers for total user confidence
Pulls double duty as a changing table
Comes with safety tethers and hardware
Available in a wide variety of colors
cons: Although relatively easy, assembly can take a while

customer_reviews.title: Not just for babies
customer_reviews.text: I decided to decorate my (very adult) bedroom with gray furniture. However, finding a dresser or bureau in gray that isn't intended for a baby nursey proved harder than anticipated. (Weird, I know). I took a chance on this dresser, even though it appeared it was marketed for nurseries and I could not be happier. It is good quality, easy to assemble and looks great. I would definitely recommend for baby or other.
customer_reviews.author: Serena valley

customer_reviews.title: Do no purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!! I hired a handyman to put the dresser together. It turns out the wood panels have holes along the front of the furniture. In addition to this, the wood pieces for the drawers do not interlock making it impossible to piece together the drawers. I made several attempts to contact the manufacturer via email and phone and I never heard back from anyone. I may have agreed to replacement parts but it’s obvious customer satisfaction is unimportant to StorkCraft. This is unacceptable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Great dresser
customer_reviews.text: This was my second one I purchased. I liked the dresser so well for my first kid, I got the same for my second kid. Straightforward assembly, fairly easy (there is always some difficulty with any furniture assembly). Color looks amazing. Drawers work very well and I like that the top drawer has a little slant to it. Drawers are excellent size for a nursery dresser. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy dresser
customer_reviews.text: I know this is technically a child's dresser but I have a very small space to work with and this fit perfectly. I would recommend this to anyone living in a small apartment or house. That said, it was very easy to put together. The metal rails for the drawers are already attached as well as the wooden dowels. This cut the time to build it in half. It took me about 2 1/2 hours by myself. It was also packaged very well. I've fit a lot of clothes in it so far. Overall I'm very happy with it. It is very well made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is worth $100 tops. This is on the same quality level as IKEA. The dresser had multiple pieces that were broken in shipping. I guess this is expected since the manufacturer has a phone number you can call to get replacements. We started the project then had to wait a week for replacements to show up. The dresser is cute but don't use it too much as it won't hold up. I have the gray bed and changing table and it matches then perfectly. I wish I had used the $200 towards a quality piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: SennyD

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality. Bad Instructions
customer_reviews.text: At first we were not happy with item. Instructions don’t match and the holes don’t Aline with screws. Hubby said follow the name of the items to put together. Wood quality is great. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cryssy

customer_reviews.title: Baby isn't here yet so don't know exactly how good it would be when using it regularly
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to use a combo dresser/changing table. Baby isn't here yet so don't know exactly how good it would be when using it regularly, but we started filling the drawers with clothes and they are a nice deep size. The reason I'm only giving it 3 stars is because it did already come with some visible scratches on the top side. Not so bad, but not what you want from the start. Pretty easy to put together, I was able to do most of it myself at 7months pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: Lir

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this again!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical after reading all the reviews and searching for the perfect nursery dresser for our baby but I am very happy with this purchase!! Took my husband about 2.5 hours to build but I love that the drawers actually open far enough to put clothes in, the color is beautiful, and overall it’s a good price for the product. I would highly recommend this dresser!
customer_reviews.author: Skyyyy

customer_reviews.title: First piece broken
customer_reviews.text: So far first piece pulled out was damaged. Not able to work with it. I know people say not to blame manufacturer but why does it keep happening to everyone? I could see andent or scratch but mine has a whole busted through the middle of the back piece 😭 I do like how strong and sturdy it is. it is larger than I expected which is great. I like the design. Going to call the manufacturer to see if they will replace the broken piece.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Stebbins

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is not worth the money. This dresser should not cost more than $150 based on the quality of materials and how it is finished. It is a combination of particle board, MDF and the gaps between the drawers and frame are substantial to the point that you can see the white sliders.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.

customer_reviews.title: ***** definitely 5 star!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic. Everything I wanted in a dresser for my nursery. I love the character and the color. I was able to get a matching crib/changing table and rocking chair. That made it perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Kay

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy dresser, came with small defect, color slightly different shade than expected
customer_reviews.text: Color had a blueish tint to it and a side came in bad shape, stripped of paint. However, we had wall paint that unintentionally matched the “slate” gray and we just assembled and painted the edge so that we didn’t have to wait to assemble by contacting the manufacturer. The dresser seems sturdy and the drawers are smooth when they roll out.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Good dresser, came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Two of the pieces arrived damaged and they were exterior pieces so now we have to wait for Storkcraft to send replacement parts. The drawers are smaller than I expected as well. The color is really nice and goes well with the Davinci Autumn crib we purchased in slate gray. There wasn’t much offgassing either which was nice. Just wish the dresser came undamaged!
customer_reviews.author: HMK

customer_reviews.title: Almost decided not to buy this
customer_reviews.text: I was concern about the quality and issues with the drawers slides. It took me maybe 1.5 hours to assemble this dresser and the drawers slides are really good. The dresser package weight about 122 lbs, so make sure you have some help in lifting it.
customer_reviews.author: BJSully

customer_reviews.title: Great dresser and great price!!
customer_reviews.text: These dressers are beautiful!! I have been searching online for ever to find something easy to assemble, good quality and actually looks nice. I highly recommend these. I’ll be changing out the knobs for gold here soon.
customer_reviews.author: katieclark625

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful dresser that was simple to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful dresser that was simple to put together. It goes well with the other storkcraft nursery items in gray. I wouldn't recommend trying to match other brands of furniture to the storkcraft gray, because the storkcraft furniture is a dark gray.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on finished side badly
customer_reviews.text: Multiple pieces have bad damage and scratches on the finished side. Seems like it’s built ok just can’t put it out to where it’s seen with all the scratches ect .
customer_reviews.author: shawn thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nice dresser
customer_reviews.text: The drawers slide out very smoothly. It looks really great and there's plenty of room. Matches the grey marco island captain bed we got for our son as well. Plenty of space in each drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Susan N.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend This Dresser!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase for my 14 y.o. son's room. The instructions for assembly were easy to understand and all parts were there. I think it took about an hour to assemble by myself - and I'm a girl ;). The finish is nice and it's very sturdy - not flimsy and cheap at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Perfect for nursery.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect dresser for my nursery! Sturdy, looks great! It was hard to put together but any dresser is right? Turned out very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsi Preston

customer_reviews.title: Material not as sturdy and some scratches all over
customer_reviews.text: The pieces arrived chipped at the corner. One part was extensively chipped. We had to be careful not to get a splinter. Hopefully it lasts at least a year or 2. The color was darker than it looks on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Omkar I.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dresser
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this dresser. I bought the chest recently and loved that piece as well. Very good quality. Easy to assemble. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Drawers are sturdy. Looks nice. For the price very happy with results!
customer_reviews.author: S. Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Paint
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed at all with this product. There chipped paint on the top of the dresser and on one of the drawers. There was also damaged wood on another drawer. Would be better off to purchase at an actually store and haul yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels solid. We paid for the Amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels solid. We paid for the Amazon handy man to put it together so can't comment on assembling. The top right draw needs an extra push to close because it's not aligned up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gerlach

customer_reviews.title: Nice for cost
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for a new baby. Lots of assembly, not solid wood, wood material.
customer_reviews.author: CMartin

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This Dresser is well built and solid. Drawers slide nicely. I am impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Like others have stated the back is not flush and ...
customer_reviews.text: Like others have stated the back is not flush and we had to maneuver it in a way to fit to screw in. It's a bit small but will serve it's purpose in the nursery. A bit for the back not to fit but overall it was easy to assemble. Just follow the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Lhough85

customer_reviews.title: Nice dresser for good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice dresser for good price. Some pieces arrived slightly scratched, but not significant enough for us to send in for replacement as it was fairly hidden once assembled. Pretty easy to assemble for a large dresser.
customer_reviews.author: newmama25

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy It Already!!!
customer_reviews.text: Whew!! Took about 2-3 hours to assemble alone. TOTALLY worth that time & DEFINITELY worth the money. It’s so pretty and much sturdier than I expected. Must buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: The dresser seems very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can’t ask for more. The dresser seems very sturdy and well made. It did take 2 people over an hour to build, but the instructions were easy to follow. For a child’s dresser it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dstin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy material, easy to clean and easy to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy material, easy to clean and easy to put together when following the directions. My husband and father in law set it up in about an hour. We are really satisfied with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for nursery room, looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, but it came with really strong smell and one Scratch. I won't return it because I'm about to give birth any day.
customer_reviews.author: Mali

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY !
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY THIS , piece missing , scratch on the top and directions are absolutely horrible , you will drill holes in the front of it bc the directions are backwards , and ruin the dresser completely
customer_reviews.author: Chandra jones

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came scratched and light damage. But not to noticeable can't complain for a kids room.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together well crafted
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together well crafted, not the standard particle board stuff! It was a little bit more shiny than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: MattyB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality of this dresser. Very solid when assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Justice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks great with my new room .
customer_reviews.author: Peter A

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was cracked in certain places and it's missing the knobs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this item for our future child. Very pleased with the shipping, setup, and final product. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kory/Lisa

customer_reviews.title: This product was better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This product was better than expected, it is heavy and solid. The paint finish is even and true to color shown. Only 4 stars because the top couple drawers stick a bit but I am hoping they loosen up.
customer_reviews.author: Kim baker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent infant-to-child dresser
customer_reviews.text: Looks as pictured, absolutely perfect for my infants room! I like how deep the drawers are.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

product_meta.title: StorkCraft Kenton 6 Drawer Universal Dresser, Gray, Kids Bedroom Dresser with 6 Drawers, Wood & Composite Construction, Ideal for Nursery Toddlers Room Kids Room
product_meta.description: The Storkcraft Kenton 6 Drawer Universal Double Dresser is the perfect choice to store all of your child's belongings (and then some). Designed to be coordinate with any Storkcraft crib, the Kenton combines classic styling with functionality that will grow with your child. The Kenton double dresser features six spacious drawers with euro-glide drawer tracks and high-quality steel hardware construction. This easy to assemble Storkcraft Kenton dresser will provide years of enjoyment and make a great addition to your child’s room.
feature_bullets: BEAUTIFUL DESIGN: The Storkcraft Kenton 6-Drawer Universal Dresser has an attractive, classic design to bring a touch of elegance to any bedroom or nursery. This easy-to-assemble dresser is the perfect combination of elegant design & practical function.

CO-ORDINATE YOUR STYLE: Designed to match any Storkcraft crib, glider, or change table, the Kenton bedroom dresser is ideal for organizing baby's clothes, socks, onesies, or even burp rags & diapers! Sturdy & functional, it fits seamlessly with any décor.

ORGANIZATION MADE EASY: With 6 spacious drawers to fit clothes, accessories or toys, the Storkcraft Kenton Dresser will help you keep the nursery, toddler's room, or kid's room neat and organized. The stylish, sleek design will look beautiful for years.

COMPLETE BEDROOM SOLUTION: Storkcraft manufactures products for the total infant, kid’s, or teen bedroom solution, including changing tables, dressers, glider rocker chairs, mattresses, beds, and bunk beds from brands like Graco, Thomasville, or Broyhill.
Universal dresser coordinates with any Stork Craft crib, glider or change table
Features six spacious drawers to fit clothes and accessories
Made with high-quality wood and composites in a safe, non-toxic finish
Easy to assemble with steel hardware construction. Make sure the brackets are firmly attached to the wall stud and furniture frame and the safety strap is snug
Available in white, cherry, espresso, black, gray and dove brown finishes

specifications.material_composition: High-quality wood and composites; steel hardware
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars76 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
